description: Detecting suspicious error log events which lead to potential security threats
name: Anomaly Nginx_High
query: event.dataset: "nginx.error" and message: "http invalid header:" or message: "client sent invalid header:" or message: "zero size buf" or message: "zero size buf in writer" or message: "rt signal queue overflow recovered" or message: "auth http server sent invalid response" or message: "memcached sent invalid trailer" or message: "http charset invalid utf"  or message: "client sent too large request" or message: "upstream sent invalid header" or message: "client intended to send body data larger than declared" or message: "receive buffer overrun" or message: "request reference counter overflow while processing" or message: "http2 preread buffer overflow" or message: "upstream sent too large http2 header name length" or message: "upstream sent too large http2 header value length" or message: "header is too large"  or message: "client sent invalid host in request line" or message: "no OCSP responder URL in certificate" or message:"empty host in OCSP responder in certificate"
